body: At 7th level, if a martial artist suffers any effect that causes ability damage, ability drain, or temporary ability score penalties, the effect is reduced by 1 point. This reduction increases by 1 for every three levels beyond 7th (to a maximum reduction of 5 at 19th level). This ability replaces wholeness of body, timeless body, and tongue of sun and moon.
name: Physical Resistance
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Monk/Monk Archetypes/Martial Artist/Physical Resistance
